mapper.select: SELECT * FROM point WHERE cus_no = #{cus_no} AND p_type = 0 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM point WHERE cus_no = #{cus_no} AND p_type = 1 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM point p INNER JOIN shop.order o ON p.order_code = o.order_code WHERE p.p_type = '0' AND o.status = '2' AND p.cus_no = '3' ORDER BY p.id DESC

SELECT *, DATEDIFF(expire_date, NOW()) AS days_left FROM point WHERE cus_no = #{cus_no} AND p_type = 0 AND expire_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(expire_date, NOW()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(expire_date, NOW()) >= 0 ORDER BY expire_date
SELECT SUM(amount) AS upcoming_points FROM point p INNER JOIN shop.order o ON p.cus_no = o.cus_no WHERE p.cus_no = #{cus_no} AND p.p_type = 0 AND o.status = 0 GROUP BY p.cus_no

SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_expiring_points FROM point WHERE cus_no = #{cus_no} AND p_type = 0 AND expire_date IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(expire_date, NOW()) <= 30 AND DATEDIFF(expire_date, NOW()) >= 0 GROUP BY cus_no
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN p_type = 0 THEN amount ELSE 0 END) - SUM(CASE WHEN p_type = 1 THEN amount ELSE 0 END) AS total_points FROM point WHERE cus_no = #{cus_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point (cus_no, amount, use_date, order_code, p_type) VALUES (#{cus_no}, #{amount}, NOW(), #{order_code}, #{p_type})
